column4: Hi guys, this might sound stupid, but are you able to use 2 shells in 'recovery mode'? I am going to dd restore my PC but Id like to use irssi at the same time...
[ATM] Nightshift: I see that ctrl+alt+F1 is my current shell, but when I open others I just get a blinking _
you should be able to get to get new shells with CTRL-ALT-F1, F2, etc for different shells.  Or, you can load irssi and just Ctrl-z and standby it and then fg to get it back when you need it
